personal.name: Venu Vardhan Dommeti
personal.title: B. Tech in Computer Science
personal.bio: Aspiring IT graduate seeking an entry-level software development role to apply skills in Python, cloud computing, and web development. Passionate about building scalable applications, leveraging machine learning, and delivering innovative solutions. Dedicated to continuous learning, growth, and contributing effectively in a dynamic team environment.
personal.intro: I'm a passionate developer who loves turning ideas into beautiful, functional applications. Welcome to my digital space where creativity meets code.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science
education.school: Sagi Rama Krishnam Raju Engineering College, Bhimavaram
Dr. K. K. R's Gowtham Concept School, Rajamahendravaram

experience.title: Machine Learning Intern
responsibilities: Designed and developed an automated face recognition attendance system using React.js, Flask, and MongoDB.
Built a real-time dashboard for attendance visualization and analytics.
Integrated face recognition with KDTree for efficient and accurate matching.
Collaborated with the team to optimize system performance and reliability.

experience.title: Data Analytics Intern
responsibilities: Completed 5 key tasks including 2 machine learning projects and 2 data analysis assignments.
Developed and deployed a Power BI dashboard for insightful data visualization.
Received certificate of completion and letter of recommendation for successful project delivery.

experience.title: AWS Cloud Computing Intern
responsibilities: Gained hands-on experience with AWS services including EC2 and IAM.
Developed a user-based access control system with automatic bootstrapping for efficient user management.
Implemented permission-based bootstrapping to ensure script execution only with head approval, maintaining confidentiality.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams using Agile methodologies.

projects.title: AI Powered Chatbot using RAG
projects.description: An intelligent chatbot system utilizing Retrieval-Augmented Generation to provide context-aware and accurate responses. Integrated with LangChain, Gemini LLM, and embedding models for advanced query understanding, with a Gradio-based interactive UI for seamless user experience.

projects.title: Chat Application using MERN Stack
projects.description: A full-stack real-time chat platform built with MERN stack and Socket.IO for instant messaging. Features include secure authentication with JWT, private chats, and persistent message storage in MongoDB for a seamless communication experience.

projects.title: Osteoporosis Detection Using Hybrid ML
projects.description: A medical diagnostic system that leverages hybrid machine learning models to detect osteoporosis from bone scan images. Combines deep learning for image feature extraction with traditional ML algorithms for classification, improving accuracy and early detection rates.

projects.title: YouTube Video Rater
projects.description: An AI-powered tool that analyzes YouTube video comments using NLP to provide sentiment scores and engagement ratings. Integrates with the YouTube API to fetch real-time data and delivers insightful visualizations for content evaluation.

projects.title: Find A House
projects.description: A user-friendly platform for searching rental houses and PG accommodations with interactive maps and filters. Utilizes Firebase for real-time data storage and Google Maps API for location-based property listings and navigation.

projects.title: Image Quality Enhancer
projects.description: An AI-driven image enhancement tool that uses deep learning techniques like autoencoders and convolutional neural networks to improve image clarity, reduce noise, and upscale resolution while preserving details.

projects.title: Banking Customer Churn Analysis
projects.description: A Power BI dashboard project analyzing banking customer churn data to identify key churn drivers, track retention metrics, provide actionable insights for reducing customer attrition through interactive visualizations.

projects.title: Health Tracker
projects.description: A mobile app that helps users monitor their daily health metrics like steps, heart rate, and sleep patterns. Built using Android Studio with Firebase integration for real-time data syncing and personalized health insights.

achievements.title: Research Paper Publication
achievements.description: Co-Author of research on concrete strength prediction using Deep Forest machine learning model

achievements.title: Hackathon Top 3
achievements.description: Third place winner for developing an innovative face recognition based attendance app in 24 hours.

achievements.title: Competitive Programming
achievements.description: Earned over 1000 Hackos through consistent problem-solving and coding challenges.
